summary: This is an external email congratulating law enforcement personnel on the guilty verdict of Ghislaine Maxwell, acknowledging their sacrifices and the positive impact on victims.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the guilty verdict being congratulated in the email.

persons.name: Det
persons.context: Addressed in the congratulatory email for their work on the Maxwell case.

connections.description: Worked together on the Ghislaine Maxwell case, as both are congratulated for the guilty verdict.
SA was involved in the investigation leading to Maxwell's guilty verdict.
Det was involved in the investigation leading to Maxwell's guilty verdict.

events.title: Guilty Verdict for Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was found guilty, prompting a congratulatory email to law enforcement.

keyFacts: The email congratulates law enforcement (SA and Det) on securing a guilty verdict against Ghislaine Maxwell.
The sender acknowledges the sacrifices made by the investigators over several years in working on the Maxwell case.
The email states that the work of the investigators made a difference and that the victims likely feel the same.
The correspondence is dated December 29, 2021, shortly after Maxwell's verdict.
